info.name: Project X API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Project X - Vehicle Auction Platform

Authentication: HttpOnly cookie-based auth
CSRF: Required for unsafe methods (POST/PUT/PATCH/DELETE)

item.name: Auth
item.description: Authentication endpoints - Cookie-based auth with CSRF protection

item.name: Account
item.description: Account management endpoints - Requires cookie auth + CSRF

item.name: Admin - Users
item.description: Admin user management - Requires admin role

body.raw:
{
  "name": "My Shipping Company",
  "companyPhone": "+1234567890",
  "contactEmail": "contact@company.com",
  "website": "https://company.com",
  "country": "USA",
  "city": "New York",
  "description": "Professional vehicle shipping services",
  "basePrice": 500,
  "pricePerMile": 1.5,
  "customsFee": 200,
  "serviceFee": 100,
  "brokerFee": 50
}

item.name: Inquiries (User)
item.description: User inquiry endpoints - Create and manage inquiries with companies

body.raw:
{
  "company_id": 1,
  "vehicle_id": 1,
  "message": "Hi, I am interested in shipping this vehicle. What is your best price?",
  "subject": "Shipping inquiry for vehicle",
  "quoted_total_price": 2500.00,
  "quoted_currency": "USD"
}

item.name: Inquiries (Company)
item.description: Company inquiry endpoints - Manage inquiries from users (requires company role)

item.name: Vehicle Data
item.description: Vehicle makes and models reference data
